get.description:
Placeholders:
%M Obj Name
%V Volume
%C Chapter
%T Title
%A Author (first in list)
%I Chapter Internal ID
%i Obj Internal ID
%Y Year (Obj)
            
?_(...) replace _ with a value from above:
Everything inside the braces will only be added if the value of %_ is not null
